# Get the serialnumber of the machine via the CIMinstance cmdlet $serial = (Get-CimInstance Win32_BIOS -ErrorAction Stop).SerialNumber
# Format the serialnumber to give back the last 4 characters prefixed with 'PC-' return 'PC-{0}' -f $serial.Substring($serial.Length - 4)

HKU = &H80000003 Set reg = GetObject("winmgmts://./root/default:StdRegProv") Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
If reg.EnumKey(HKU, "", sids) = 0 Then If Not IsNull(sids) Then For Each sid In sids key = sid + "\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Explorer" name = "LockedStartLayout" If reg.GetDWORDValue(HKU, key, name, existing) = 0 Then reg.SetDWORDValue HKU, key, name, 0 End If Next End If End If

# ============================================================ # DENKO ICT - First Logon Setup Script # ============================================================ # This script runs during the first user logon after Windows installation. # It launches the main deployment script which handles all configuration. # # RMM Agent Setup: # - Place any RMM agent installer on the USB root (filename must contain 'Agent') # - Example: DattoRMMAgent.exe, RMM-Agent-Installer.exe, Agent.exe # - The installer will be copied to C:\DenkoICT\Download\Agent.exe during setup # - The deployment script will execute it after hostname change and reboot # ============================================================
Write-Host "Customizing your device. Please wait..." -ForegroundColor Cyan Write-Host "Launching deployment script in a new window..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
# Launch main deployment script in a new window (non-blocking) # This allows the FirstLogon window to close properly while deployment continues Start-Process powershell -Verb RunAs -ArgumentList "-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command `"irm 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Stensel8/DenkoICT/refs/heads/main/Scripts/ps_Init-Deployment.ps1' | iex`""
Write-Host "Deployment script launched successfully." -ForegroundColor Green Write-Host "The setup will continue in separate windows." -ForegroundColor Green Start-Sleep -Seconds 2
